description: Detects the use of the Microsoft Windows Resource Leak Diagnostic tool "rdrleakdiag.exe" to dump process memory
author: Cedric MAURUGEON
Florian Roth (Nextron Systems)
Swachchhanda Shrawan Poudel
Nasreddine Bencherchali (Nextron Systems)
name: Process Memory Dump via RdrLeakDiag.EXE
query: (((process.command_line.text:("*fullmemdmp*" OR "*\/memdmp*" OR "*\-memdmp*") AND process.command_line.text:("*\ \-o\ *" OR "*\ \/o\ *") AND process.command_line.text:("*\ \-p\ *" OR "*\ \/p\ *"))) OR ((((process.executable.text:"*\\rdrleakdiag.exe") OR (winlog.event_data.OriginalFileName:"RdrLeakDiag.exe")) AND process.command_line.text:("*fullmemdmp*" OR "*\/memdmp*" OR "*\-memdmp*"))))
